Interface ChatRoom

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChatRoomImpl

    public interface ChatRoom
extends Remote
    Remote interface of a chatroom.
    Author:
    kim

      • getID

        int getID()
          throws RemoteException
        getID
        Returns:
        id of the chatroom
        Throws:

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(Client client)
                  throws RemoteException
        getMessage
        Parameters:
        client - client that requests the message (needed so we can filter out message in case of block)
        Returns:
        the most recent message in the chatroom
        Throws:
        RemoteException - thrown when problem with remote method-call occurs.

      • getUsers

        ArrayList<Client> getUsers()
                           throws RemoteException
        getUsers
        Returns:
        list of clients connected to the chatroom
        Throws:
        RemoteException - thrown when problem with remote method-call occurs.

      • addMessage

        void addMessage(Client user,
              String message)
                throws RemoteException
        addMessage
        Parameters:
        user - user that sends the message
        message - message to broadcast to the other users
        Throws:
        RemoteException - thrown when problem with remote method-call occurs.

      • addUser

             throws RemoteException
        addUser
        Parameters:
        user - user to be added to the chatroom
        Throws:
        RemoteException - thrown when problem with remote method-call occurs.

      • removeUser

        void removeUser(Client user)
                throws RemoteException
        removeUser
        Parameters:
        user - user to be removed from the chatroom
        Throws:
        RemoteException - thrown when problem with remote method-call occurs.

                  throws RemoteException
